directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  Add onion, celery, carrot, green pepper, and garlic: saute until tender.  Stir in tomatoes, chili powder, tomato paste, vinegar, and pepper.  Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 10 minutes.
Stir in kidney beans, and cook an additional 5 minutes.
Cut a 1/4 inch slice off the top of each kaiser roll; set aside.  Hollow out the center of each roll, leaving about 1/2 inch thick shells; reserve the inside of rolls for other uses.
Spoon bean mixture evenly into rolls and replace tops.   Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
title: Unsloppy Joes
